member.name: D3D11_BLEND_DESC1.AlphaToCoverageEnable
member.summary: Specifies whether to use alpha-to-coverage as a multisampling technique when setting a pixel to a render target. For more info about using alpha-to-coverage, see Alpha-To-Coverage.

summary.para: Specifies whether to enable independent blending in simultaneous render targets. Set to TRUE to enable independent blending. If set to FALSE, only the RenderTarget[0] members are used; RenderTarget[1..7] are ignored.
See the Remarks section for restrictions.

member.name: D3D11_BLEND_DESC1.RenderTarget
member.summary: An array of structures that describe the blend states for render targets; these correspond to the eight render targets that can be bound to the output-merger stage at one time.
